name: The Arena (whatshouldmyusernamebe)
description:
You play as a fighter in an Arena fighting against vicious knights who can slice you into pieces with their swords. Your only self defense weapon ... a ball and chain. Can you defeat the knights while at this disadvantage?

Halfway through the fight, you manage to break the chain apart. Can you adapt to a hit and run playstyle instead of a stand and fight one before the knights take you down?

Notes:

If you want actual full-screen, click the expand button after the made by Unity loading screen

The program can only lock your cursor if you click on the screen.

Made by Exodus Productions and I.
